Text.Page:
Please! Oh, by all the gods! My wife was right behind me!

The kulkari, th-they burned our farm. Two nights we've been running and hiding.

We were almost here when the destroyersâ€”

I know she's alive! It was just minutes ago!

Kill the destroyers! Get her back! Please, she's all I have!

Veora?

Where is she?! You have to have found her! It's only been a few minutes!

Can't you go back? She must be there, she must be!

Veora!!!!
